law.catch_line: Signature Project Program -- Purpose -- Two initiatives -- Criteria for state participation -- Qualifying expenditures -- Authority review -- Required determinations by the authority -- Pledge limitations -- Tax incentive agreement required -- Authority may approve reduction in required minimum capital investment.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 36, sec. 1, effective June 25, 2013. -- Repealed, reenacted, and amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 18, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 18, effective March 23, 2007.
